description:
The evolution of what many consider to be the definitive belay device for most climbing days. The ATC-XP features 2 toothed notches on one side to provide holding power for catching, lowering, or rappelling. The other side is smooth, just like the original ATC, to allow low-friction payout when rappelling.

  • Made of aluminum
  • Fits 7.7 to 11mm ropes
  • Window through the body has rounded, machined edges and reduces weight by about 30%
  • Smoothly bevelled teeth help keep belays snag free
  • Rigid keeper wire won't get sucked into slots
name: Black Diamond ATC-XP Belay Device
